website_summaries.verdict: Folks liking the Pathfinder Mid CSWP simply for its glove-like fit are vastly missing out on its other great things. The gear also has exceptional lightness, huge amounts of comfort, and an almost non-existent softening period. However, they might get disappointed because of its unruly laces. To sum up, the Salomon Pathfinder Mid CSWP is more than capable of emboldening hikers on the trail. People who are still quite concerned about its slick laces can either lace up with double knots or replace them with considerably effective ones.
pros: A multitude of wearers found a great fit in the Salomon Pathfinder Mid CSWP
This hiking boot impressed many reviewers with it superbly comfortable construction
Despite its muscular build, this footgear was commended by several users for being surprisingly lightweight
Its short break-in period astonished a decent number of owners
Some hikers loved the boot’s outstanding ankle support
The Salomon Pathfinder Mid CSWP shocked a few testers with its amazing surface traction
One consumer applauded the shoe’s excellent waterproofing
cons: A reviewer was flabbergasted by the footwear’s laces for coming undone quite often
Its pull tab detaching from the upper way too soon infuriated a verified purchaser

customer_reviews.title: NO GO. Bummer.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a pair of size 9 which all other shoes I've owned in the last 15 years have been. They were too small so I exchanged them for a size 9.5 and again, they are too small to wear. The problem is now a size 10 will put the toe box so far out in front of my normal feet that they won't be wearable, except like clown shoes. If you wear wool boot socks I suggest highly ordering a full size large and expecting the fit to be odd. I really wanted to like these boots but I just can't order another size up. Time to head to the local store and try on what actually fits.
customer_reviews.author: The Duke and Duchess of AmazonTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: love them
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable but need a day to break in. A lot of people complain about a tight fit and when you first put them on they are snug but after wearing for a couple hours they were perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A shoe? More like a solid boot
customer_reviews.text: This is my first product that Ive used from Salomon. However, these arent shoes, theyre definitely bots. The appearance and construction are first rate. However, they run a bit snug for my big American feet. Ive only worn them a little bit but overall they feel durable and comfortable, Ill be wearing them a lot more this fall and winter as I go hiking more.
customer_reviews.author: Gee Money

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Started wearing Solomons on patrol a few years ago due to the weight. (Speed Assault?) Those are still excellent, and this waterproof hiker, though slightly heavier, is just as comfortable. Being full synthetic, you can toss ‘em in the washing machine with a couple old towels and they come out looking brand new. Solomon’s the go-to for me, especially since my knees and ankle deteriorate with age...
customer_reviews.author: Patrick OConnor

customer_reviews.title: NEVER HAD A PROBLEM BEFORE
customer_reviews.text: Thank you amazon for making returns so easy! Boots were to small and felt uneven, like the instep was lower than the outer boot. Really seemed like a factory second. I have worn salomons over the last 10 years and never had an issue before like this.
customer_reviews.author: zinggoo

customer_reviews.title: Not all Solomon are created equal
customer_reviews.text: I have a pair of Solomon Quest GTX boots that I just bought and love. I needed a 2nd pair of boots and did not want as high of a top, so I went with this style. They are definitely not made the same. Much cheaper variety. The toe guard is stitched on instead of glued on which will lead to separation as some reviews mentioned. Plus I ordered the same size and they are much smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Regina R

customer_reviews.title: Great boots for Disc Golf
customer_reviews.text: My second pair of Salomon hiking boots. I loved the first; wore them to death for 3 years, in snow, mud, rain, woods, etc. These boots NEVER let my feet get wet; weigh practically nothing; are comfortable as running shoes, and- they stand up to abuse. Lots of abuse. My favorite, hikers, bar none. I rarely wear anything else to play Disc Golf, or hike.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Rothstein

customer_reviews.title: My new go to boot
customer_reviews.text: So I’ve used Salomon shoes for a long time. My only complaint was the thread didn’t last super long but for the comfort that was ok. These are the most comfortable hiking boot I’ve worn. I use these to do HVAC service and the waterproofing and fit will have me buy these again hands down.
customer_reviews.author: Drewis1337

customer_reviews.title: Look and feel great!
customer_reviews.text: Way more padding than expected but bought them for the cold weather. Looking forward to breaking them in and getting a better idea of how good they are. If they are like the other products I have from them they will perform as advertised and expected.
customer_reviews.author: Tridragonz

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I am really happy with this purchase. I wore a 10.5 before this but got an 11.5 and it was a perfect fit. They are not "waterproof" but water resistant. Water gets in around the top of the tongue area. They lace up tight when I need them to be. The eyelets up at the top allow me to tighten the shoe around the area when I want. The grip on the bottom is really useful for ascending and descending all kinds of terrain. I even wore them mountain biking. A really versatile shoe. Stylish and comfortable. They go great with my meriwool socks.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: To small and tight
customer_reviews.text: Well I wanted to like these. I always wore 9.5 Regular but these feel like 8 narrow. Yes the tread is aggresive, they are lite really lite. The most lite weight boots I've seen. The size is the only negative side I seen in them.
customer_reviews.author: Kendall

customer_reviews.title: These boots are waterproof and sturdy while not feeling clunky
customer_reviews.text: Beastly! I stand on my feet coaching on a pool deck for over 8 hours a day. These boots are waterproof and sturdy while not feeling clunky.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As describe
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit if you have regular human feet, if not you should know whats your size. Is a shoe type boot so is not soft as a runnung shoe. Provides ankle protection and grips well.
customer_reviews.author: Julio Dominguez

customer_reviews.title: Quite pleased
customer_reviews.text: They fit well, are comfortable, and look good. Would like to see a solid black option as the green is a little unusual, but not over the top or anything.
customer_reviews.author: leec

customer_reviews.title: These are excellent boots.
customer_reviews.text: These are another great salamon product. They fit great with no breaking in time ,they have excellent traction ,and are water proof. What more can you ask for?
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer  Vale

customer_reviews.title: Great brand, sizing is off.
customer_reviews.text: Way too small. Usually a size 10.5 got an 11 just to be safe and had to return them for a 12. Salomon are our favorite hiking shoe brand overall. No leather and still totally waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: TG

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality , super light weight I'm very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Runs very narrow
customer_reviews.text: These boots runs small and narrow around toes. Without insole it would have been perfect size, but for winter I need more insulation.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Knight

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart at a seam in the same location on both shoes after 40 days
customer_reviews.text: Would like to return the shoes but missed the return window by 10 days. I have worn them atleast 5 days a week during this time and today see where both shoes and coming off of the seam in the location where the natural bend in the foot is . For $130 dollars I would expect better than this. Suppose I will have to ride it out and hope that the will last with out coming apart
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the occasional hike
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shoe but only held up for two months. I work at a wildlife preserve and do a lot of hiking. Would be a great buy for someone who doesn’t use them daily
customer_reviews.author: Marie Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Highly water resistant
customer_reviews.text: Used them for the first time today kept my feet dryer than any other shoe I've hikied in, considering I was hiking in the rain and through patches of mud and water several inches deep. The only thing I have too say against them is that there rather stiff even for new boots and hoping I just need to break them in
customer_reviews.author: Barrett Baca

customer_reviews.title: Super Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I'm on my feet most of the day. These boots have been amazing. They are warm but not too hot. I end up in different terrains and weather conditions. I have thought about purchasing a few more pairs to replace when these wear out. I love and recommend these boots.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Noll

customer_reviews.title: Built to last
customer_reviews.text: It’s a wonderful shoe that is made very well I use them for work because I walk on cement all day They keep my back feeling good My only issue is that they don’t breathe very well. My feet sweat after about 4-5 hours wearing them
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: great boots
customer_reviews.text: they look great and feel sturdy and will definitely go the distance for rugged hiking
customer_reviews.author: filosofia cafe

customer_reviews.title: GOOD FIT AND GREAT ANKLE SUPPORT
customer_reviews.text: These boots had no break-in period and have been on some fairly challenging 2 and 3 hour hikes. The grip on rocks has been solid.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Castillo

customer_reviews.title: NOT HAPPY ABOUT THE PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: THIS PRODUCT HAD A LIFETIME WARRANTY BUT I DID NOT EXPECT IT TO BREAK WITH 6-7 MONTHS. ESPECIALLY PAYING SO MUCH MONEY FOR IT. I HAVE NEVER BEEN SO DIS-SATISFIED ABOUT THIS BRAND. MY LAST PAIR I DIDN'T PAY SO MUCH AND LASTED FOR A LONG TIME. I HOPE SOMEONE CALLS ME REGARDING THIS ISSUE PLEASE. THANK YOU.
customer_reviews.author: dpatel

customer_reviews.title: Had shoes for two days and they ripped.
customer_reviews.text: Had shoes for two days and went to put them on and then the tab on the back tore.
customer_reviews.author: franklin walz

customer_reviews.title: From light to heavy duty footwear
customer_reviews.text: Had them on for 2 days now doing work, most comfortable hiking style boot I have ever worn I love merrels & 511 but I will have to say if all of Solomon's footwear Fits and feels the way these do I will buy all of them
customer_reviews.author: Red beard

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been a size 10 my whole adult life. I ordered a size 10 and they fit perfect and feel great. I’m not sure why so many people had issues with the size scale. I’ll definitely be ordering my next pair from Salomon.
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best fitting and most comfortable boot I have ever owned!
customer_reviews.author: Philip Roberson

customer_reviews.title: They fit true to size
customer_reviews.text: These are an excellent boot for comfort well-made I work for Fed-Ex and do a lot of walking and my feet never bother me
customer_reviews.author: paul nedorost

customer_reviews.title: Great hiking boot
customer_reviews.text: A bit on the narrow side, but overall great quality. Lightweight and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Harry Huncken jr.

customer_reviews.title: Not 100% synthetic
customer_reviews.text: Although the description for this product says that it is 100% synthetic, the label attached to the shoe indicates that is made with animal hide.
customer_reviews.author: bwb

customer_reviews.title: All good.
customer_reviews.text: The toe box was a bit big, but length size was exact. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: J. Rey

customer_reviews.title: ... do a lot of hiking and this shoe fits like a glove
customer_reviews.text: We do a lot of hiking and this shoe fits like a glove. I will be purchasing a second pair. Great support and I did not need a break in period.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great fitting and good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Fits just perfect and good quality. Mi bf loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Dyanara Ojeda

customer_reviews.title: Amazing shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly well done with thoughtful design shoes! Five out of five stars!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice but wrong size
customer_reviews.text: Size was not a true fit ... But i did like them...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Crap shoot
customer_reviews.text: This product came in and the box the shoes were in was completely destroyed
customer_reviews.author: Briana Keller

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and super comfortable!!! Added the Salomon speed laces and they’re just right.
customer_reviews.author: Lorin Tembeckjian

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof!
customer_reviews.text: Nice boots but definitely not waterproof which was the main feature I was after. Maybe next pair?!
customer_reviews.author: kandykanekan

product_meta.title: Salomon mens Pathfinder Mid Cswp M
product_meta.description: Take the trail or create your own. The Pathfinder Mid is ready for any weather or trail surface, with a waterproof membrane, great cushioning, and Salomon's Contagrip sole for wet and dry grip.
feature_bullets: WATERPROOF HIKING SHOES: Blending classic details with modern technology, the Pathfinder ClimaSalomon WP features an all-terrain grip & protective toe cap to deliver comfort, protection, & precision.
ANY PATH YOUR WAY: With its waterproof, durable, all-terrain grip the Salomon Pathfinder line of shoes is perfect for walking, hiking, backpacking, or trail running on every type of terrain.

GO THE DISTANCE: Whether you love daily road running in your neighborhood, an escape to a local trail, or something more rugged, Salomon makes shoes that ensure you have a smooth ride on any & all terrain.
TIME TO PLAY: Whether you are into trail running, hiking, backpacking, or mountaineering, Salomon has shoes & gear for kids, men & women to help you conquer a new distance, personal record, or event.
SINCE 1947 Salomon has used our passion for outdoor sports & innovation to create progressive gear. Our road & trail running shoes, hiking sneakers, boots, & water shoes help make any path your own.
